ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] The exact recipe
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that tinkering is a waste of time unless we have the exact recipies. I cannot personaly afford to waste so much PP on rumours and wild goblin chases. I
ygData.messageBody:
I think that tinkering is a waste of time unless we have the exact recipies.
I cannot personaly afford to waste so much PP on rumours and wild goblin
chases. I would invest my money in all other trades before I would Tinkering
and that is because of the sheer waste of time and pp it has become. Quite
frankly the items that people dreamed of sounded alot more exciting than the
skill as it is right now. However, i am hopefull that someday verant will see
how disgusting the trade has become with virtually no beneifeits to the
tinkerer.... Cloverleaf <Fennin Ro>
